value:
Now and again, I feel a strange ache
in my head...as if my mind is crying
out for memories it has lost...

Azura? Of course, of course. Azura...
She...she is my daughter... My, er...
My daughter?

I have been told my song can melt
away one's stress. Should you ever
feel overburdened, call on me.

I wouldn't speak of my past even if
I could. There are too many painful
memories I prefer to keep buried.

♪You are the ocean's...♪ Oh, pay
me no mind. I feel compelled to fill
the silence with song.

I was sent to sing to you, courtesy
of $Nf. May I?

Strength is the only way to ensure
your survival.
It seems I still have room to improve.

Forgive me... Such poor performance
ought to be beneath me.

With this, I will prove your faith
in me is not misplaced.

I am Arete. I will serve you to the best
of my ability—so long as you promise
safety for both me and my daughter.

When I look at you, I am struck by
the impression that you and Azura
are quite a bit alike...$k$pThough she and I are related by
blood, I've always felt that she has
a certain strength I seem to lack.$k$pI worry such strength may draw
unwanted attention to her and
keep her from a normal life...$k$pAs summoner, you must surely
realize what sway fate holds
over us all...$k$pI wish not to discourage you from
breaking the chains of fate. On the
contrary, in fact...$k$pI will do everything in my power to
ensure you can both live your lives
as you choose to.
はっ
おやめなさい
きゃあっ…
いけない…
Forgive this.
Mm-hmhmhm...
Begone!
Be a dear and die.
But...I...
*Chuckle*
I am Arete, queen of Nohr and wife of King Garon.
Ah! Aren't you a bit old for such games?
As King Garon's second wife, I am forever in the shadow of his first...
My only wish is for Azura to grow up healthy, and strong.
If you wish to know where I am from, I do apologize; I must avoid the subject.
Azura... I hope you know that I love you...
If you can make use of my abilities, I will gladly lend them to your cause.
Just so.
And you're sure?
Shall we, then?
